definition: (literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
ninth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/ninth in order/letter "I" or Roman "IX" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 345°/nona
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
to visit (a meeting, class, trial etc)
to do what one is told/obedient

sentences.english: His talking is full of speculative thinking, it sounds quite logical.
sentences.chinese: 講話的思辨性極強，聽起來很有邏輯。

sentences.english: There aring a lot of secrets in the man heart can't say literally that let wife listen to.
sentences.chinese: 男人心中有好多祕密不能隨便說給妻子聽。

sentences.english: It sounds like the crying of a baby.
sentences.chinese: 聽起來像小孩的哭泣聲。

sentences.english: These arenormally sedate affairs where empty chairs outnumber the audience.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，空椅子比聽衆多是讀書會上很平常的事。

sentences.english: VOICE: So it sounds as if anabolic steroids can be very destructive.
sentences.chinese: 所以，聽起來合成代謝類固醇的破壞性會很大。

sentences.english: Let's go to the megastar's singing performance, shall we?
sentences.chinese: 我們去聽那個天王巨星的演唱會，好嗎？

sentences.english: The mayor is so popular that he has the whole town under his thumb.
sentences.chinese: 市長如此深得人心，全城人都聽他的。

sentences.english: He killed off the whole morning by listening to the music.
sentences.chinese: 他通過聽音樂消磨掉了整個上午的時光。

sentences.english: Maaike tells me about her life. I am soon jealous.
sentences.chinese: 瑪艾克則給我講了她的生活，我聽着聽着就嫉妒了。

sentences.english: Maaike tells me about her life. I am soon jealous.
sentences.chinese: 瑪艾克則給我講了她的生活，我聽着聽着就嫉妒了。

sentences.english: Listen to the tape and find out the main idea of this article and how it is organized.
sentences.chinese: 通過聽錄音磁帶，來幫助學生對文章的結構有所瞭解。

sentences.english: If I were to add the word pigmy, ring a bell?
sentences.chinese: 如果我加上詞，矮人，聽起來熟悉嗎？

sentences.english: So the widow one day entreated me to sing it to her thus.
sentences.chinese: 因此這位寡婦有一天請求我用這調子唱給她聽。

sentences.english: The LORD finds us enough reasons for prayer, and we ought to thank Him that it is so.
sentences.chinese: 上帝樂意聽我們的瑣碎絮語，我們也該爲此獻上感謝。

sentences.english: When I was listening to the final theme song, my heart was kind of stirred and could not calm down.
sentences.chinese: 聽着最後的主題曲，我的心情久久不能平靜。

definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
variant of 聽|听[ting1]/to hear/to obey
